description: Updates the settings for the specified Amazon Chime account. You can update settings for remote control of shared screens, or for the dial-out option. For more information about these settings, see Use the Policies Page in the Amazon Chime Administration Guide.

parameters.name: AccountSettings
parameters.description: The Amazon Chime account settings to update. DisableRemoteControl (boolean) --- Setting that stops or starts remote control of shared screens during meetings. EnableDialOut (boolean) --- Setting that allows meeting participants to choose the Call me at a phone number option. For more information, see Join a Meeting without the Amazon Chime App.

nested_params.name: DisableRemoteControl
nested_params.description: Setting that stops or starts remote control of shared screens during meetings.
